name: Create FreshBooks services from new rows in Google Sheets
description: Every time a new row in Google Sheets is created, Make will create a FreshBooks service out of it. To make sure the scenario works fine check if your spreadsheet corresponds to this (example)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rAKxCIrSDCAu6QgBKjMrsNNQIDnvPyn88R8pebxkKDQ/edit?usp=sharing].
